headline: Comcast (NasdaqGS:CMCSA) Celebrates Miami Art With Innovative Smartphone Sculptures Initiative
summary: Comcast (NasdaqGS:CMCSA) recently initiated an artistic collaboration in Miami-Dade County, partnering with local artists to celebrate the role of mobile technology in business. This announcement coincides with a series of expansions in network services across various U.S. regions and the introduction of advanced cybersecurity solutions by the company's DataBee unit. Amidst these developments, Comcast's share price remained mostly flat over the past month, in alignment with broader market...

headline: Comcast Supports Free Haircuts for Military Community in Bossier City and Shreveport, LA
summary: On Tuesday, May 20, in Shreveport and Wednesday, May 21 in Bossier City, LA, Comcast sponsored the 5th Annual Free Haircut Giveaway, organized by the African American Celebration Corporation. All veterans and active duty service members were invited to participate in the event and receive a free haircut. In addition, attendees learned about Comcast initiatives that help Bossier City and Shreveport residents and businesses.

In addition, attendees learned about Comcast initiatives that help Bossier City and Shreveport residents and businesses.

headline: Disney to pay almost $439 million to take full control of streaming service Hulu
summary: Disney will pay Comcast's NBCUniversal nearly $439 million for its stake in Hulu, taking full control of the streaming service.  Disney said in November 2023 that it was acquiring a 33% stake in Hulu from Comcast for at least $8.6 billion.

raw.headline: Disney to pay almost $439 million to take full control of streaming service Hulu

headline: Universal Ads Launches TV’s First API Partner Program to Revolutionize TV Advertising with Curated Creative and Measurement Solutions
summary: NEW YORK, June 10, 2025--Today Universal Ads, which enables brands of any size to create, buy, and measure ads across premium video, introduced a first-of-its-kind TV Business Partner Program that presents advertisers with cutting-edge, hand-picked creative and measurement solutions to strengthen their media buys across inventory available via Universal Ads. This is TV’s first program that will allow brands, especially those new to the TV ecosystem, to access tools to build, test, and launch TV
